attributes.action: Stop Mp's using mobile phones in the HoC when important debates being discussed.
attributes.additional_details: So many times this is happening. When PM May was discussing the Brexit situation 3 Mp's behind her were on their mobile phones pointing and showing each other what was on their phones, not listening to what was being said and this all being on live TV showing an attitude of no respect for what is important to the people of this country.
attributes.background: So many Mp's using their mobiles on both sides of the house when serious issues are being discussed and having to go to a vote.
